Source.Name: transgui
Source.Summary: A feature rich cross platform Transmission BitTorrent client
Source.Description: Transmission Remote GUI is feature rich cross platform front-end to remotely control Transmission daemon via its RPC protocol. It is faster and has more functionality than builtin Transmission web interface.

Package.Name: transgui
Package.Summary: A feature rich cross platform Transmission BitTorrent client
Package.Description: Transmission Remote GUI is feature rich cross platform front-end to remotely control Transmission daemon via its RPC protocol. It is faster and has more functionality than builtin Transmission web interface.
